meanings.sent1: After finishing his chores, he enjoys lazing on the couch.
meanings.sent2: She was lazing in the sun, feeling the warmth on her skin.
meanings.sent3: The cat was lazing around, pretending to be too tired to play.
meanings.sent4: The clouds were lazing across the sky, moving slowly and peacefully.
meanings.sent5: The sloth was lazing in the tree, taking its time to move.

meanings.definition: To spend time in a relaxed or lazy way
meanings.sent1: On weekends, they love lazing by the pool, soaking up the sun.
meanings.sent2: The dog was lazing on the porch, watching the world go by.
meanings.sent3: She was lazing in bed, not wanting to get up and face the day.
meanings.sent4: The river was lazing through the valley, meandering gently.
meanings.sent5: The students were lazing in the park, enjoying their break from studying.
